author: Tom Walker
description: Tom Walker, the originator of this cocktail explains, "With the origins and popularity of the Daiquiri and the Mojito firmly rooted in the 19th and 20th century, and taking inspiration from an American-style of drink making which spawned the 'Maid' category, it was time the 21st century contributed its own version..."
name: Maid in Cuba
recipeIngredient: 15 ml Sugar syrup 'rich' (2 sugar to 1 water, 65.0Â°brix) (2 sugar to 1 water)

recipeInstructions.text: POUR absinthe into ice-filled glass, TOP with water and leave to stand
Separately SHAKE other ingredients with ice (Don't muddle cucumber)
DISCARD contents of glass (absinthe, water and ice) and STRAIN contents of shaker into absinthe-coated glass
